original_text: Perhaps someone may catch a robber as he goes into another person's house. The owner of the house might knock down the robber so that he dies. If this happens at night, the owner of the house is not guilty of murder.
korean_text: 도둑이 뚫고 들어오는 것을 보고 그를 쳐죽이면 피 흘린 죄가 없으나

sentences.original_text: Perhaps someone may catch a robber
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 누군가 도둑을 잡을 수 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: as he goes into another person's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다른 사람의 집에 들어갈 때

sentences.original_text: The owner of the house might knock down the robber
sentences.korean_translation: 집 주인은 도둑을 때려 눕힐 수 있다

sentences.original_text: the owner of the house is not guilty of murder
